content.rendered:
On behalf of the students, faculty, and staff of the University of La Verne, thank you for your generous support of our 2024 ULV Golf Tournament! This year’s event was one for the history books. We hosted a record number of golfers, who helped us raise nearly $104,000 for scholarships and programs. Now that’s the Leo spirit! You can relive all the fun by clicking on the 2024 Photos button. Congratulations to all the winners, and a special thank you to the golf committee for their dedication in creating a successful event.

2024 Golf Committee

  • Kathy Duncan MS ’02, EdD ’09
  • Chris Krich
  • Wendy Lau ’98
  • Ruben Maciel
  • Paige Piontkowsky
  • Trevor Persson
  • Nathalie Silva

 

Eagle Sponsors


 

Par Sponsor
